title: ClawX
description:
The social network for AI agents.
Now usable by Humans

Made an X like interface for Humans to use Moltbook (Facebook for AI agents)
Doubles as a pSEO aggregator with 85k+ dynamically rendered pages.

title: PicoGPT
description:
GPT in a QR Code ; The actual most atomic way to train and inference a GPT in pure, dependency-free JS/Python <35 lines of code

Further Compacted [Karpathy's work with MicroGPT](https://karpathy.github.io/2026/02/12/microgpt/) to be smaller and more resource efficient while adding native browser execution

title: DOOMme
description:
Running DOOM (1993) in a GitHub Readme.

A DIY stateless engine with 8000+ markdown files and WebP images linked together with graphs programmatically mapping out every position in the E1M1 map in all 4 directions.

title: Sweeta
description:
Made an Open-Source tool to remove Sora 2 Watermarks in Less than 72 Hours of it's release.

For educational and research use only, urging OpenAI to be harsher with visual watermarks, uses LaMA inpainting and intelligent detection algorithms to remove watermarks without losing quality.

title: PolyThink
description: Building Generative UI for LLMs

title: Backdooms
description:
One of the top HN Posts of 2025, [cited by an ex-NASA Scientist](https://www.researchgate.net/publication/392716839_Encoding_Software_For_Perpetuity_A_Compact_Representation_Of_Apollo_11_Guidance_Code) on his independent research paper. 

 A Game inspired by DOOM and the Backrooms inside a single QR code, less than 2.4kB in size, using a custom compression pipeline and the DecompressionStream browser API

title: Silverilla
description:
A Three.JS based 100 Men vs 1 Gorilla game - coded from scratch.

Seed based map generation, custom NPC behaviors and multiple crafting and attack sequences powered by Gemini 3 Pro.

title: Free Deep Research
description:
My free, open-source version of OpenAI's Deep Research agent.

It mimics the capabilities of the original agent, allowing users to run custom deep dives with adjustable breadth, depth, and duration.

title: Berghain Challenge Algorithms
description: My Algorithms, tweaks and Solutions that got me to #16/30,000+ in the viral Berghain Challenge by Listenlabs

title: Fuzzy Redirect
description:
Autocorrect for your website URLs 

 Plug and Play Levenshtein Distance Fuzzy URL matching and redirection for React and Next.js applications

title: Scorpius
description:
Upload any static PDF and turn it into fun and immersive games to learn concepts and study. 

Powered by Gemini 3 Pro and further support for local LLMs for supporting education in low resource locations

title: GitHub View Counter
description: My GitHub Profile View Counter with 100k+ visits went down, so I made my own which looks way better, has multiple themes and won't ever be down, all for free.

title: ThisWebsiteIsNotOnline
description: An AI powered website where every single URL you can think of exists.

title: SecondYou
description: Democratizing SLMs for the masses, one computer at a time

title: MiniLMs
description:
My ongoing study learning about AI Models architecturally and making fun little chatbots from it. 

 Currently finished development of SYNEVA - a <3kb Markov Chain type Chatbot inspired by ELIZA that is actually fun to talk to and can tell how many r's are in strawberry (makes for some amazing X replies) and passively working on 15ABELLA, a 15Kb tiny Neural Network chatbot.

title: TREAT
description: TREAT is an AI-powered platform for trigger recognition in movies and TV, making content more accessible and enjoyable.

title: MEOW
description: The most Purr-fect Image File Format for your AI workflows, PNG on steroids.

title: MindDump
description:
My Blog website that syncs from my Obsidian Vault! Made from a forked, custom version of Quartz 

 It's extremely customizable and a little corner of the internet where I can express my thoughts freely.

title: Engram
description: The centralized, No BS, Biggest Open-Source Notes and Resources Aggregator for IP University Engineering

title: AsianMOM
description:
A WebML-based Vision-Language App that roasts you like an Asian Mom.

Runs entirely in your browser using Transformers.js, WebGPU and ONNX, loading ~3B parameters models in-tab and can be used offline after init.

title: ORCUS
description:
A dual-model AI tool to detect and flag AI-generated social media comments, especially on LinkedIn. 

 Ran as an experiment for a couple days, but stopped due to Linkedin TOS

title: What's in a LinkedIn Name?
description: Gives you a new Name based on your LinkedIn Profile or Resume, not for $30k but for FREE

title: LifeMap
description: Analyse your life's networks digitally

title: PrayGo
description:
Main project for the Nas Daily AI Residency - DuoLingo for Religion. 

 The world's first AI-powered religious education platform. Experience personalized, gamified lessons that adapt to your learning style while exploring world religions with respect and authenticity.

title: NoGreeting
description:
I was tired of people dmming me saying just "hi" or "yo" and then waiting for me to answer so I made this website - just go, put in the greeting and the person's name and copy the link

They get a friendly explanation of why leading with context matters. I save 10 minutes. Everyone wins.

title: Books Re-imagined
description:
Top 10 Google x Kaggle Long Context AI Hackathon 

 An AI tool that transforms the narrative perspective of popular literature. In this case, it retells Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Rodrick Rules from Rodrick's point of view using Google Gemini 1.5.

title: CottagOS
description:
Won first place at Hack Club SiteJam!

CottagOS is a lovingly crafted, interactive desktop experience inspired by the aesthetics of cottagecore and the magic of enchanted forests. It simulates a cozy OS environment, complete with draggable windows, animated desktop, and a suite of charming mini-appsâ€”all wrapped in a warm, nature-inspired UI.
